events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to a wrong item being shipped to the customer.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the wrong item shipment.
Hello, thanks for reaching out to us. I understand you received the wrong item and would like to help with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached the photo of the wrong item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide instructions on returning the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund and will follow the return instructions you provided.
Your refund has been processed and the return label sent. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and managed to return the wrong item without any issues.
As the refund has been completed successfully and no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
